title: riots quality balance team
body:
I would like to thanks riots excellent balance team for doing the worst job possible so for with balance the game state is nothing even close to being good, I do have a few questions tho

Why can assassins one-shot other champs with little to no effort?
Why can tanks do more damage than damage dealers with no damage items?
Why do point and click abilities do more damage then skill shots?
why are riots balance team nerfing champs that don't need it but buffing champs that need nerfs Darius, lee sin, rengar and zed for example

please don't make a comment trying to justify riots wrongdoings the game state is a joke and it needs fresh new minds behind the balance team at riot to make things better

replies.body:

these are questions for riot, not a irrelevant player

What you're looking for is Ask Riot: https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/#category/ask-riot?askriot=open

Who is correct what are you talking about

Yeah riots balance team dropped the ball a long time ago. It's been downhill since morello quit and ghostcrawler took charge. I am actually certain most player in low silver could do a better job balancing this game and for the love of god this shit show called the boards needs to be reverted back to the old boards. It's literally dead here.

> Why can assassins one-shot other champs with little to no effort?

Well, they wouldn't be assassins otherwise, would they? It's kinda what they do.

That said, they certainly shouldn't be able to do it to most any opponent, rather to the squishy ones, and even then circumstantially.

Honestly, I don't think the issue is so much the balance team itself, but rather the general "mood" Riot, as a company, has taken on over the past couple years or so (and is likely to continue into the foreseeable future). Riot just doesn't care as much about player experience and creating a good game as they did several years ago, all of that has been pushed aside to make way for profit in recent times. *IF* Riot were to go back to the good old values of the early season, we'd likely see a sharp increase in the overall quality of the game, but I doubt (as most do) that that will happen.

Why aren't riot doing anything, because their entire balancing team is ranked gold or lower, and have 0 comprehension of what is and isn't broken

The team needs to be MINIMUM Dia+, for them to understand the difference between broken and not broken.

And to add to their uselessness, most of them play 1 game a week
